feature.label: UIMA tools (includes Runtime)
feature.description: This feature contains a debug structure handler plugin, the Component Descriptor Editor (a forms-based editor for creating and editing the XML descriptors used by UIMA), the JCas generation capability, a CAS Editor, the Launcher, and the PEAR packaging capability.
